english: Sanitation Standard for the Microorganism in Bottled and Packaged Drinking Water
title: 包裝飲用水及盛裝飲用水微生物衛生標準

articles.content: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Safety and Sanitation.
This standard applies to bottled and packaged drinking water which is suitable for human consumption.

The maximum level of microorganism (Only applied to bottled and packaged drinking water which is suitable for direct consumption):
┌────────────┬──────────┐
│Microorganism           │Limit               │
├────────────┼──────────┤
│Coliform bacteria       │Negative            │
├────────────┼──────────┤
│Fecal Streptococci      │Negative            │
├────────────┼──────────┤
│Pseudomonas aeruginosa  │Negative            │
└────────────┴──────────┘
This Standard shall be implemented at release date.
